videos.description: The Kings turn the ball over and Patty Mills sinks a 3-pointer for the Nets on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bruce Brown makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kings' turnover leads to a 3 for Patty Mills

videos.description: Andre Drummond shows off his vision with a nice dime to Bruce Brown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Andre Drummond shows off his vision with nice dime vs. Sacramento Kings) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Andre Drummond's nice dime sets up a bucket for Bruce Brown

videos.description: Seth Curry knocks down a long 3-pointer vs. the Sacramento Kings.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Seth Curry knocks down long 3 vs. Sacramento Kings) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Seth Curry knocks down a 3 from well beyond the arc

videos.description: LaMarcus Aldridge works his way in for an and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMarcus Aldridge fights off defender for and-1) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMarcus Aldridge fights off Kings' defense for and-1

videos.description: Chimezie Metu drains a buzzer-beater to end the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chimezie Metu drains buzzer-beater to end from Brooklyn Nets vs. Sacramento Kings) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chimezie Metu beats the 1st-quater buzzer with a 3

videos.description: Patty Mills beats the shot clock to score for the Nets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Patty Mills drops in the smooth shot) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Patty Mills drains a contested jumper to beat the shot clock

videos.description: Bruce Brown gets the sweet basket to drop plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bruce Brown gets the basket plus the foul) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bruce Brown drops in the sweet and-1 circus shot

videos.description: Seth Curry shows off his vision with a nice dish to Andre Drummond, who finishes with a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Seth Curry shows off his vision with nice dish vs. Sacramento Kings) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Seth Curry dishes to Andre Drummond for a jam

videos.description: Andre Drummond denies Richaun Holmes with this big block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Andre Drummond denies Sacramento Kings with block) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Andre Drummond emphatically denies Richaun Holmes

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox fakes out LaMarcus Aldridge enough to create a lot of space and drain a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (De'Aaron Fox pulls off an impressive fake job on LaMarcus Aldridge) 20222/14/ ESHEET

videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox pulls off an impressive fake job on LaMarcus Aldridge

videos.description: James Johnson and Andre Drummond show off their dunk games for the Nets in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Johnson, Drummond throw down impressive slams for Nets) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Johnson, Drummond throw down impressive slams for Nets

videos.description: Bruce Brown makes a great defensive play for the steal, and Kessler Edwards gets it on the other end for a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bruce Brown makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2022/02/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bruce Brown's steal leads to Kessler Edwards' 3-pointer

videos.description: Seth Curry tries to score off a Kings turnover, but he gets called for a travel, and the Nets can't believe it.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (The Nets can't believe Seth Curry got called for a travel on this play) 2022/2/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: The Nets can't believe Seth Curry got called for a travel on this play
